text: Ciudad Juárez is a city in the Mexician state of Chihuahua. About 1,600,000 people live in Ciudad Juárez. This makes it the fifth largest city in Mexico and the largest city in Chihuahua. It is at the border to the USA, opposite El Paso. ==References== Category:Cities in Mexico Category:1659 establishments Category:Settlements in Chihuahua Category:17th-century establishments in Mexico
title: Ciudad Juárez
